entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
